name: The Confraternity of Toast 2
description:
Promotion valid until 22th June 2019 at 11:59 pm Rome GMT + 2

Do you want to receive this game for FREE? are you a YOUTUBER (from 0 to 100,000 subscribers)? well follow these instructions:
• Play and made a Youtube video for my game
1) Bill's Hotel
2)The Confraternity of Toast
3) Subject N°34761553
• Write a comment with the addition of your youtube video in the corresponding game pages (NOT on this page)
• After doing this contact me on Twitter (@DemaStudios) with your OFFICIAL channel page and you will receive a free copy of this game!

This game is FREE for Youtubers +200,000 subscribers!

Contact me on Twitter (@DemaStudios) with your OFFICIAL profile to receive a free copy!

DESCRIPTION:

You are a leading actor of all the films of Dema studios, the most prestigious film studios in history! It's a normal day at work but something breaks into your day. Dema was kidnap from a toast called "Toast X Master". Will you be able to save it? or will you leave it to its tragic destiny?

FEATURES:

• NO parkour test! (I promise!)
• 7 playable chapters!
• More than 1h 30min. of play! (if you explore everything)
• Scary jumpscare!
• 7 different type toast with different personalities!
• 1 little extra adventure + other stuff!

FOLLOW ME ON:

WARNING!

• This game contains flashing lights!

• This game contains loud noises, turn down the volume!

• This game isn't suitable for children!
